## frequencies() function

Returns the frequency of each value in an array.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function frequencies<T>(array: T[]): Map<T, number>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  array | <code>T[]</code> | the array to get the frequencies of |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Map<T, number>`

the frequency of each value in an array
